## IToolbox.render() method

Fills the toolbox with new toolbox items and removes any old contents.

**Signature:**

```typescript
render(toolboxDef: ToolboxInfo): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toolboxDef | [ToolboxInfo](./blockly.utils_namespace.toolbox_namespace.toolboxinfo_interface.md) | Object holding information for creating a toolbox. |

**Returns:**

void
